players.name: Alice
memory: You investigated Diana and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Charlie: "I find it strange that Bob was the one who got eliminated during the night. Let's keep a close eye on each other and make sure we vote wisely."

Diana: "I'm shocked about Bob too. We need to be really careful here - with only three of us left, one wrong vote and the mafia wins. Does anyone have any information that might help us figure this out?"
Diana: "Alice, you've been very quiet. In a game this small, silence can be suspicious. What are your thoughts on who might be the mafioso among us?"

players.name: Charlie

Diana: "Alice, you've been very quiet. In a game this small, silence can be suspicious. What are your thoughts on who might be the mafioso among us?"
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Alice, Diana voted for Alice
